Plot: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.
Writer: Daphne Du Maurier (from the story by), Evan Hunter (screenplay by)
Actors: Rod Taylor, Jessica Tandy, Suzanne Pleshette, Tippi Hedren
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 5 nominations.
Title: The Birds
